title: Request import bookmarks.html and right-click properties
author: app/
body_snippet:
Simple question I hope, love the program :-)

I work with VMware and Nutanix, I'm looking for something to simply import bookmarks.html in mRemoteNG, instead of doing a scan all over the world in our network.

And instead of config view, I like to have right-click and properties/config

iterations.description: The bookmarks importer logic already existed but was not exposed in the UI. I have enabled it by adding the necessary file filters and resource strings.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): The bookmarks importer logic already existed but was not exposed in the UI. I have enabled it by adding the necessary file filters and resource strings.
Approach: Enable BookmarksHtmlImporter in Import.cs, add 'Netscape Bookmarks (*.html)' to file dialog filters, and add missing resource strings.
